title: I want a PBE account :)
body:
Hi, i'm here to ask for a PBE account beacause i'm from LAS and i think we are in disadvantage in terms of chances of receiving an account on that server.
Thanks to stop by and read and i hope you understand my situacion :)

replies.body: Keep in mind that if you have an account created on NA, you can apply to become a tester for the PBE.  Although for the immediate future, the PBE will not be accessible to LAS/LAN :(

I am in NA Spent over $300 on the game in 6 months done surveys and referred friends also got old friends to play again, why am I not being accepted? Only leaverbusters I've ever got was from black screen crashes and glitches.
